metadata.creator: Foreign Affairs Association of Japan
metadata.description: This vol. 12 no. 9, dated September 1943 of “Contemporary Japan : a Review of East Asiatic Affairs” contains reports, conferences, reviews of East Asiatic Affairs written by Japanese authors. Some of the articles are Facts behind anti-Fascist Revolution, Metropolitan Government of Tokyo, Monisticism of America etc. Also, the periodical has book reviews, extracts and documentary materials.
metadata.subject: Japan
metadata.title: Contemporary Japan: A Review Of East Asiatic Affairs
